item.description:
Hey guys and gals,

Anyone up for some more recreational beach volleyball? If someone has another net, I can up the RSVP number. We had a good turnout last time so I'm confident that a lot of people will show up. Also, I'll set up closer to the other volleyball nets this time, so it's easier for people to find. 

Recreational - Players possessing basic skills/fundamentals of the game. Laid-back game with focus on repetition of the basics.

Low Intermediate - Players with some experience playing in informal settings (family gatherings, etc) Should be familiar with 4-2 formation (middle front setter).
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the volleyball nets and Gabriel in a speedo ;)
item.name: Recreational/Low Intermediate Volleyball at Carson Beach
